item.title: Quick and Easy Hot Tomatillo Salsa
item.description:
My attempt at making a tomatillo salsa with easily acquirable ingredients that is a consistent favorite!

Ingredients

16 Tomatillos - remove skins and rinse
5 Cloves Garlic
1 Jalape√±o
